team-describe: Deri Protocol is designed and developed by Defi Factory, a team of experts of lfinance, math and computer science. The core members have PhD degrees in science and come from the derivative business of Wall Street. The team has in-depth experiences of derivative pricing/trading/structuring. The team members have been in the crypto trading and solidity programming for several years.
